snippet.title: Grand Kokoro | BxB Kinetic Visual Novel | Episode 1 | Trailer 1
snippet.description:
Here is the first trailer for Episode 1 of Grand Kokoro. It's a BxB tragic, paranormal, romance story told in the form of a Kinetic Visual Novel.

For more information on "Grand Kokoro - Episode 1" or to play the demo! Please visit our Itch.io page: https://stcrowncrest.itch.io/grand-kokoro-ep1

Or our Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/889030/Grand_Kokoro__Episode_1/

And don't forget to follow our twitter @StCrownCrest to stay up-to-date on all new releases of Grand Kokoro and our other visual novels!
